DOC.brief_summary: Aim study ass interaction sildenafil fluvoxamine effect venous response sodium nitroprusside .
DOC.detailed_description: In randomise , double-blind , placebo-controlled , cross-over study healthy men assess effect oral fluvoxamine ( 50mg qd day 1-3 ; 100mg qd day 4-10 ) sildenafil kinetics ( single oral 50mg dose day 11 ) . Sildenafil plasma concentration determine LC/MS . We also assess effect sildenafil venodilation induce constant dose-rate NO-donor sodium nitroprusside ( SNP ) preconstriction phenylephrine ( dorsal hand vein compliance technique ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy , male individual , age : 1845 . Able willing give write informed consent Hypotension (  65 mmHg diastolic  100 mmHg systolic blood pressure ) Bleeding disorder medical history Intake medication impair platelet function influence coagulation ( example aspirin , NSAID others ) precede 4 week Known condition cause endothelial dysfunction ( e.g . diabetes , hyperlipidaemia , arterial hypertension , hyperhomocysteinaemia , smoke ) Anatomic deformity penis like angulation , penile fibromatosis ( peyronie ’ disease ) diseases favour priapism ( e.g . leukaemia , plasmocytoma , sicklecell anaemia ) Regular medication and/or treatment drug within precede 46 week ( exclusion decide case ) alcohol ( > 30 g/d ) drug abuse Acute chronic illness Blood donation within precede 2 month Participation clinical trial within 2 month study Drug and/or alcohol abuse .
